alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Far Northwest Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Jemez Mountains; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northwest Plateau; Tusas Mountains Including Chama; Union County; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 3:21AM MDT until April 19 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Jemez Mountains, Tusas Mountains Including Chama, Upper Rio Grande Valley, Far Northeast Highlands, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, Union County and Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...From Noon today to 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Far Northwest Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Jemez Mountains; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northwest Plateau; Tusas Mountains Including Chama; Union County; Upper Rio Grande Valley
